DOM Manipulation

The WebSDK Supports the following:

Browser Resize

  • Browser fullscreened
  • Browser docked on screen
  • Browser manually resized
  • Device rotated

Video Element

  • Element with `data-sm-video` is added
  • Element with `data-sm-video` is removed
  • Element has `data-sm-video` added
  • Element has `data-sm-video` removed

Content Elements

  • Element with `data-sm-content` added
  • Element with `data-sm-content` removed
  • Element has `data-sm-content` added
  • Element has `data-sm-content` removed
  • Element's `data-sm-content` value changed
